headline: Global Payments (NYSE:GPN) Sees 13% Drop in a Week Following HR Chief Resignation
summary: Global Payments (NYSE:GPN) is experiencing a substantial personnel change with the resignation of its Chief Human Resources Officer, Andréa Carter, which may bring uncertainty regarding company direction in human resources. Additionally, the company's share price saw a 13% decline over the past week. This move coincided with significant downward pressure across stock markets, driven by escalating global trade tensions, which pushed major indices like the S&P 500 and Nasdaq into a broader...
